response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and the high quality it offers, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering the value this product provides, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time, effort, and expertise that have gone into creating something truly exceptional. I trust that you will find immense value in this investment. If you're interested in discussing further or have any questions, please let me know.
